fools_gold.name: Fools Gold
fools_gold.description: Only 1 time, if you were to lose gold in battle (not challenge), the Fools Gold will be lost instead. Consumed after use.

grumbo_ticket.name: Grumbo Ticket
grumbo_ticket.description: Completely replenishes all battle and challenge stocks.

duel_converter.name: Duel Converter
duel_converter.description: Converts a battle stock into a challenge stock.

gamblers_coin.name: Gambler's Coin
gamblers_coin.description: Can only use 1 at a time. Gain 80 exp... or maybe lose 80 exp... or maybe...

berserk_potion.name: Berserk Potion
berserk_potion.description: Increases victory chance by 5%. Every battle, the victory chance increased goes down by 1%, all the way down to -5% in the last battle. Can only have 1 active at a time.
